abstract: Demonstrators disrupt City Hall budget hearing to protest so-called 'broken window' policing practices under New York City Police Commissioner William J Bratton; City Council members come to Bratton's aid after he is repeatedly interrupted by protestors, requesting that chamber be cleared of interlopers.
lead_paragraph: The relationship between New York City lawmakers and police officials, damaged over a few turbulent months last year, appears to be improving.

headline.main: As Protesters Disparage Bratton, an Unlikely Defender Emerges: City Council
headline.print_headline: As Protesters Disparage Bratton, an Unlikely Defender Emerges: City Council

snippet: The relationship between New York City lawmakers and police officials, damaged over a few turbulent months last year, appears to be improving.
